backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor managing user profiles and inquiries with access control and admin/user permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping a branding update feature to affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing roles of various frontend React components and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global frontend styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining root element and page title using updated Alexis Granite branding.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with Home and Dashboard routes wrapped in AppLayout.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: UI screen informing users they lack permission and offering navigation back to home.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Shared page layout providing header, branding, navigation, mobile menu, and authentication button.
frontend/src/components/InquiryForm.tsx: Validated inquiry submission form sending user contact and project details to backend.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button handling Internet Identity login/logout with loading feedback and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting newly authenticated users to enter and save their name profile.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing authenticated or anonymous backend actors with auto‑refresh on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity auth using AuthClient, exposing identity state, login, and logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and inquiries via an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining light and dark color themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app root, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard page that handles authentication, profile checks, inquiry loading, and admin access control.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page with marketing sections, images, and an inquiry form trigger.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session storage values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and container settings using CSS variables and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s metadata, existing features, and pending feature requests for the Alexis Granite website.
